title: After a dry spell, IT sights green shoots with higher budget for 2024
description: IT budgets for calendar 2024 are expected to go up by 9% compared to a mere 2% growth in 2023 budgets, research and analysis firm HFS Research told ET.
content: Green shoots have started showing for the IT services companies after a catastrophic year when tech demand nosedived amid geopolitical and macroeconomic concerns, and analysts expect a revival in IT spending in 2024.IT budgets for calendar 2024 are expected to go up by 9% compared to a mere 2% growth in 2023 budgets, research and analysis firm HFS Research told ET.Analysts from firms including Macquarie Group and S&P Global said the environment has improved slightly and the commentary around renewals is not just about large multi-year deals, but also about programs that were paused earlier.
